code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Blog.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=_ref=>{let{onClose}=_ref;const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchPosts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/blogs/index.json');const data=await response.json();setPosts(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching blog posts:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchPosts();},[]);const handlePostClick=postId=>{navigate(`/blogs/${postId}`);};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-loading",children:"Loading blog posts..."})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Yash's Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-button",onClick:onClose,children:"\xD7"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Recent Posts"}),posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-preview",onClick:()=>handlePostClick(post.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"post-date",children:post.date})]},post.id))]})})]});};export default Blog;
